trans-unit.source: Manages serialization of activities into designer-generated source code segments before compilation.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia a serialização de atividades em segmentos de código gerado pelo designer de origem antes da compilação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to associate with this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> para associar a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified serialization provider to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o provedor de serialização especificada para o Gerenciador de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider"></xref> to be added.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider"> </xref> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> associated with <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"> </xref> associado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use Context to provide information to a nested <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager>.
trans-unit.target: Use o contexto para fornecer informações para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager> aninhados

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type and adds it to a collection of named instances.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do tipo especificado e o adiciona a uma coleção de instâncias nomeadas.

trans-unit.source: This provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
trans-unit.target: Isso fornece uma referência indireta para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>método de mesmo nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data <xref:System.Type> to create.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <xref:System.Type>criem.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of arguments to pass to the constructor for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>de argumentos para passar para o construtor para o tipo especificado.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The name assigned to the resulting object.
trans-unit.target: O nome atribuído ao objeto resultante.

trans-unit.source: This name can be used to access the object later through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetInstance*>.
trans-unit.target: Esse nome pode ser usado para acessar o objeto mais tarde por meio de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetInstance*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetInstance*>

trans-unit.source: If null is passed, the object is created but cannot be accessed by name.
trans-unit.target: Se null for passado, o objeto é criado, mas não pode ser acessado por nome.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add the object to the design container; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para adicionar o objeto para o contêiner de design; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object must implement <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> for this to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: O objeto deve implementar <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> para que isso tenha efeito.

trans-unit.source: The newly created object instance.
trans-unit.target: A instância do objeto recém-criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Object> of the specified name, or null if that <xref:System.Object> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Object>do nome especificado ou nulo se essa <xref:System.Object>não existe.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
trans-unit.target: Isso fornece uma referência indireta para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>método de mesmo nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref:System.Object> to obtain.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref:System.Object>obter.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> of the specified name, or null if that <xref:System.Object> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>do nome especificado ou nulo se essa <xref:System.Object>não existe.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the specified <xref:System.Object>, or null if the <xref:System.Object> has no name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref:System.Object>, ou nulo se o <xref:System.Object>não tem nome.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the object is not an activity the corresponding method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto é não é uma atividade o método correspondente a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager>é chamado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: If the activity has no parent, then the activity qualified ID is returned with any periods (.) replaced by underscores (_).
trans-unit.target: Se a atividade não tiver pai, a ID de atividade qualificada é retornada com pontos (.) substituídos por sublinhados (_).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to obtain the name for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Para obter o nome.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o nome de <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a serializer of the requested type for the specified <xref:System.Object> type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um serializador do tipo solicitado especificado <xref:System.Object>tipo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the object type is a string, a default serializer is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de objeto é uma cadeia de caracteres, um serializador padrão será retornado.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the corresponding method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o método correspondente do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>é invocado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.Object> for which to obtain the serializer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do <xref:System.Object>para a qual obter o serializador.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of serializer to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do serializador para recuperar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A serializer of the requested type for the specified <xref:System.Object> type.
trans-unit.target: Um serializador do tipo solicitado especificado <xref:System.Object>tipo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Object> that provides a service of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Object>que fornece um serviço de <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> especificado</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of service to be provided.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>de serviço a ser fornecido.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that provides a service of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que fornece um serviço de <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> especificado</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Type> of the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Type>do nome especificado.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This version of GetType provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> property of the same name.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do GetType fornece uma referência indireta para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>propriedade o mesmo nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the <xref:System.Type> to load.
trans-unit.target: O nome totalmente qualificado do <xref:System.Type>para carregar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Type>, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Type> cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Type>, ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic) se o <xref:System.Type>não pode ser carregado.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains a read-only collection of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> que contém uma coleção somente leitura do tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Using the properties available in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> class, you can query Properties about its contents.
trans-unit.target: Usando as propriedades disponíveis no <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>classe, você pode consultar as propriedades de conteúdo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count%2A>para determinar o número de elementos na coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property to obtain a specific property by index number or by name.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>propriedade para obter uma propriedade específica, por número de índice ou por nome.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to properties, you can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Find%2A> method to obtain a description of the property that uses the specified name from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Além das propriedades, você pode usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Find%2A>método para obter uma descrição da propriedade que usa o nome especificado da coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains a read-only collection of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> que contém uma coleção somente leitura do tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes a custom serialization provider from the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Remove um provedor de serialização personalizada do Gerenciador de serialização.

trans-unit.source: `provider` must have been added using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `provider`deve ter sido adicionado usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: RemoveSerializationProvider provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> property of the same name.
trans-unit.target: RemoveSerializationProvider fornece uma referência indireta para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>propriedade o mesmo nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The provider to remove.
trans-unit.target: O provedor a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Reports an error in serialization.
trans-unit.target: Relata um erro na serialização.

trans-unit.source: `errorInformation` can be of any object type.
trans-unit.target: `errorInformation`pode ser de qualquer tipo de objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the object is an exception, the message of the exception is extracted and reported to the user.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto é uma exceção, a mensagem da exceção é extraída e relatada para o usuário.

trans-unit.source: If the object is any other type, <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to display the information to the user.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto for qualquer outro tipo, <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado para exibir as informações para o usuário.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ReportError provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
trans-unit.target: ReportError fornece uma referência indireta para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>método de mesmo nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the error to report.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém o erro para o relatório.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetName*> cannot locate the specified name in the serialization manager name table.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetName*>não é possível localizar o nome especificado na tabela de nome do Gerenciador de serialização.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when serialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a serialização é concluída.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a stack-based, user-defined storage area that is useful for communication between nested serialization objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma área de armazenamento baseado em pilha, definidas pelo usuário que é útil para a comunicação entre os objetos de serialização aninhada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the specified existing <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Define o nome do operador <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> existente especificado

trans-unit.source: SetName provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
trans-unit.target: SetName fornece uma referência indireta para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>método de mesmo nome.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if you try to rename an existing object or if you try to give a new object a name that is already taken.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção é gerada se você tentar renomear um objeto existente ou se você tentar dê um novo objeto um nome que já está em uso.

trans-unit.source: In addition, an exception is thrown if you do not pass in an existing object to the method.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, uma exceção é gerada se você não passar um objeto existente para o método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> instance to name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>instância ao nome.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name to give the instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o nome a ser atribuído a instância.</xref:System.String>
